item.description: DJ BILLY BUSCH "THE MAN WITH THE SHARPEST HANDS" THROWIN IT BACK ON THE POD CAST. YOU CAN ALSO LISTEN TO HIS MIXSHOW ON HOT937.COM Saturday's from 6:00pm to 9:00pm.

item.title: K.A.V.I.A.R I'M GOING IN Part 1
item.description: Artist: K.A.V.I.A.R- one 3rd of the hip hop trio HOUSE OF REPS Title: “I’M GOING IN” mix show PT 1. Hosted by: BILLY BUSCH Release date: April 1st Track count: 29 tracks including a old school interlude mixed by Billy Busch Myspace.com/KaviarMAP Hometown: M.A.P Stamford, CT Overview: This mixtape "I'M GOING IN" explains my hunger, my vision, and my will to compete as emcee in the hip-hop today it just lets the streets know I’m a force to be wreckoned with. It features the HOUSE OF REPS, FLAVATIME, HEADCASE, SKI O , PRO, RECESS and more. The goal behind “I’M GOIN IN ” is we going in, we going hard, and we not going to stop until we get in so get used to us. It’s official street corner hip-hop at its best. My favorite tracks on this album are my solo joints “I’M GOIN IN” featuring DICE LUX and RECESS, and “WHEN I DO MY THANG”, along with HOUSE OF REPS “MY TYPE”, and HOUSE OF REPS “JUMP OFF”.
item.dc:creator: MAJIK BASS
item.itunes:summary:
Artist: K.A.V.I.A.R- one 3rd of the hip hop trio HOUSE OF REPS Title: “I’M GOING IN” mix show PT 1.
Hosted by: BILLY BUSCH Release date: April 1st Track count: 29 tracks including a old school interlude mixed by Billy Busch Myspace.com/KaviarMAP Hometown: M.A.P Stamford, CT
Overview: This mixtape "I'M GOING IN" explains my hunger, my vision, and my will to compete as emcee in the hip-hop today it just lets the streets know I’m a force to be wreckoned with. It features the HOUSE OF REPS, FLAVATIME, HEADCASE, SKI O , PRO, RECESS and more. The goal behind “I’M GOIN IN ” is we going in, we going hard, and we not going to stop until we get in so get used to us. It’s official street corner hip-hop at its best.
My favorite tracks on this album are my solo joints “I’M GOIN IN” featuring DICE LUX and RECESS, and “WHEN I DO MY THANG”, along with HOUSE OF REPS “MY TYPE”, and HOUSE OF REPS “JUMP OFF”.
